name: Herofsoft
description: Hi I myself am impressed you found this page. Any way this game is made by an 11 year old in python. I have been learning and applying things from my class. It is very fun to dev and I have created this , Herofsoft. So Herofsoft is a text game only made in python. I did not use any game engine for I am not the smartest. This game will be in progress and you will be fully updated in my trello! (https://trello.com/b/SECpXRZN/game-herosoft)
